entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# Dev Kit suggests invalid code change with new field keyword #78225
  • Improper IDE0028 Collection initialization can be simplified suggestion for `SortedList<TKey, TValue>` that changes semantics #78224
  • Compiler crash when attempting to define extension inside interface type #78222
  • Allow `[ParamCollection]` #78221

Closed

  • [Bug] `GetCompilationUnitRoot().Usings` doesn't include preprocessor directive #78223
  • Inserting line break in documentation comment results in new line being normal comment #77183

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not offer 'use auto prop' on a ref returning property #78226
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Revert "Handle textDocument/didChange notifications that don't pass a… #78227
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Start moving workspace events to fire on background threads #78134
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Cache MEF catalog in servicehub process #78122
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
